comments:
1. Have a file opened in the editor which has a problem(error or warning)
2. Run the file
3. Open the console view(the problem is showed in the view)
4. Rename the file(in the PHP Explorer view)
5. Go to the cinsole view again
6. Click on the problem in the view(from step 3)
